hints.content:
$\blue80$ is $\blue8$ tens, and $\green70$ is $\green7$ tens.

$\blue8$ tens are more than $\green7$ tens, so  **$80$ is greater than $70$**.
$5$ ones do not make any tens, so **$5$ is less than $70$.**
$5$ tens and $7$ ones are less than $\green7$ tens, so **$57$ is less than $70$.**
$7$ tens and $2$ ones are more than $\green7$ tens and $0$ ones,  so **$72$ is greater than $70$.**
$6$ tens and $8$ ones are less than $\green7$ tens, so **$68$ is less than $70$.**

question.content:
**Is each number less than $70$ or greater than $70$?**
